replies.body:
Opinion sobre mi?: Eres muy buena persona, podrías llegar muy lejos en Avicus, y tu personalidad simple y sincera te hace de una persona muy agradable con la que estar.

Mejor amigo en avicus?: GoogleNexus

Porque y cuando entraste a avicus por primera vez?: Por que me banearon de OCN y buscaba una alternativa a ello, y un amigo me pasó la ip.

replies.body: Opinions on me?: You are a really good person and I hope to see you with a yellow tag saying admin very soon. You were the person who accepted me into the translator team, and overall you are a person I can trust if I ever have problems. Thanks for being so friendly and honest <3

replies.body:
Honest opinions on me?: You are a very nice person when you are alone, but when you mix with certain people you are a bomb º.º
What team do you want to join the most?: Well, If I wasn't in Cacal or I got offered, probably Apollo or China Baby Toes.
Badlion or Kohi?: Well, I like kohi the most, but I'm temp-banned,so I have to stick to BadLion.
